fields.description: This histogram will show you the number of events each hour for a given day.
fields.name: Event time histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the pulse integral distribution of events for a given day.
fields.name: Pulse integral histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the pulse height distribution of events for a given day.
fields.name: Pulse height histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the number of coincidences each hour for a given day.
fields.name: Coincidence time histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the number of stations per coincidence for a given day.
fields.name: Coincidence number histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the distribution of reconstructed azimuth angles for a given day.
fields.name: Azimuth angle distribution histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the distribution of reconstructed zenith angles for a given day.
fields.name: Zenith angle distribution histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the distribution of the number of singles above the low threshold for a given day.
fields.name: Singles above low threshold histogram

fields.description: This histogram will show you the distribution of the number of singles above the high threshold for a given day.
fields.name: Singles above high threshold histogram

fields.description: Air pressure measurements for this day.
fields.name: Barometer
